title: साल 2019 में मेघालय में हुई बस दुर्घटना का वीडियो इंडो-चीन सीमा पर हुए विवाद का बताकर किया गया शेयर
subtitle: यह वीडियो गलवान घाटी में भारत-चीन सैनिकों के बीच हुए विवाद का नहीं बल्कि अक्टूबर साल 2019 को मेघालय में हुई एक सड़क दुर्घटना का है।
author: hindi.newschecker.in
vclaim:
Old is Gold ❤️



What a beautiful sight 😍Japanese doing Surya namaskar with our National flag as their Dress Code. India is shinning and spreading its rich culture throughout the World.



Slowly but surely we are becoming torch bearers in every field 🇮🇳 pic.twitter.com/VePMtueN4L — ProNaMo (@ProNaMoSeva) February 9, 2021

Surya namaskar (old video) in Japan with our National flag Dress Code. 

In presence of our PM @narendramodi Ji. 

We should always take pride in spreading our culture throughout the world.. pic.twitter.com/S23NkrKXC2 — Tanmay Shankar ( तन्मय शंकर ) (@Shanktan) January 13, 2019

What a beautiful sight japanese doing surya namaskar in Japan with our National flag Dress Code. We should take pride in spreading our culture throughout the world. Yoga helps to make your mind calm and keeps you healthy. #WednesdayWisdom #WednesdayMotivation#Yoga pic.twitter.com/pdUIDOkMUc — Sarvesh Tiwari (@SarveshSays) January 16, 2019

Had I not come here and met you all, perhaps this trip would be incomplete: PM @narendramodi https://t.co/zLA6X9APHD — PMO India (@PMOIndia) May 17, 2015
